DataListSpec.Name: Top Delinquent Recurring Gifts Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing top delinquent recurring gifts records.
DataListSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure BBDW.[USR_USP_DATALIST_TOPDELINQUENTRECURRINGGIFTS] ( @STARTDATE datetime, @ENDDATE datetime ) as set nocount on;
select c.[CONSTITUENTSYSTEMID], c.[FULLNAME], rs.[FREQUENCY], ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONSYSTEMID], ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE], count(rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTFACTID]) as [NUMBEROFMISSEDINSTALLMENTS], sum(rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTAMOUNT]) as [TOTALMISSEDINSTALLMENTAMOUNT] from BBDW.[FACT_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT] rgi inner join BBDW.[DIM_REVENUESCHEDULE] rs on rgi.[REVENUESCHEDULEDIMID] = rs.[REVENUESCHEDULEDIMID] inner join BBDW.[DIM_DATE] d on rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTDATEDIMID] = d.[DATEDIMID] inner join BBDW.[FACT_FINANCIALTRANSACTION] ft on rgi.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] = ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] inner join BBDW.[DIM_CONSTITUENT] c on ft.[CONSTITUENTDIMID] = c.[CONSTITUENTDIMID]
where rgi.[ISMISSEDINSTALLMENT] = 1 and (@STARTDATE is null or rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTDATE] > @STARTDATE) and (@ENDDATE is null or rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTDATE] < @ENDDATE)
group by c.[CONSTITUENTSYSTEMID], c.[FULLNAME], rs.[FREQUENCY], ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONSYSTEMID], ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE]
order by sum(rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTAMOUNT]) desc, count(rgi.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTFACTID]) desc
